title: Fall Into Food, Festivals And Fun This Season With Millennium Hotels And Resorts North America
text:
Fall Into Food, Festivals And Fun This Season With Millennium Hotels And Resorts North America By PR Newswire | 08/25/15 - 11:03 AM EDT Reprint NEW YORK , Aug. 25, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- A season full of festivals, foliage and feasts awaits travelers this autumn and to celebrate, Millennium Hotels and Resorts across the U.S. are offering a " Fall Into Autumn " package with 10 percent off Best Flexible Rates, 10 percent off Food & Beverage and complimentary Wi-Fi. Fall is a time to indulge in the nation's bounty, and with Millennium locations in cities from New York and Los Angeles to Chicago and Boulder, and rates starting at $79 per room per night ( $179 /night in gateway cities), travelers are invited to enjoy America's most fruitful gatherings. The New York City Food and Wine Festival is an internationally acclaimed foodie scene unveiling the hottest trends in dining and drink and Millennium Broadway Hotel and ONE UN New York offer ideal options for a cityscape, with the hotels' concierge teams holding the key to the city's most delicious finds. For those seeking an escape a little more "wined-down," Millennium Harvest House Boulder is steps away from the popular Colorado city's Fall Fest , featuring local artists, bands, craft beer gardens and more. Trade mountains for skyline and get away to Millennium Knickerbocker Hotel Chicago . The Windy City has River Walk Brunch Tours , BBQ competitions and "Oaktoberfest," at downtown Oak Park , offering fun for the whole family with live music, delicious fall foods from local restaurants and children's games. And, what's fall without a trip to a farmer's market? Journey to Los Angeles to discover The Original Farmer's Market 速 . Beyond LA's finest fruits and veggies, check out banjo bands, carnival games and a petting zoo for the kids - just don't feed the animals! Afterwards, head to the iconic Millennium Biltmore Hotel Los Angeles to kick up your feet. Autumn is the perfect time to take a trip to explore Alaska . Attend the Make it Alaskan Festival featuring Alaskan-made music, food, gifts and more and then retreat to The Lakefront Anchorage , which recently unveiled an extensive renovation. Additional Millennium properties are located in Boston , Buffalo , Cincinnati , Durham , Minneapolis , Nashville and Scottsdale. Parents can make their fall stay extra special for little ones with the award-winning Ask Alfred Children's Concierge program, featuring the signature Alfred bear as part of a custom-designed children's amenity kit, in partnership with leading toy company Melissa & Doug 速 and organic candy maker Surf Sweets 速 . For an additional $15 per child, kids will receive a cinch backpack filled with goodies including: an exclusive Ask Alfred cuddly Teddy Bear, natural and organic Gummy Bears, a crayon activity set, Alfred's Lovable Stickables and a set of 12 collectible Color Me postcards featuring Alfred on his travels. Millennium Hotels and Resorts will donate $2 from each Ask Alfred amenity sold to The Dream Factory , which grants the dreams of critically and chronically ill children. The "Fall into Autumn" package is valid from September 7 to November 30, 2015 and is subject to availability. Terms and Conditions apply. For reservations, call 1-866-866-8086 or visit www.millenniumhotels.com . About Millennium Hotels and Resorts North America: Millennium & Copthorne Hotels plc (M&C), listed on the London Stock Exchange since 1996, is a dynamic, global hotel company, which owns, asset manages and/or operates a worldwide portfolio of over 100 hotels throughout Asia Pacific , Europe , Middle East , and North America . Millennium Hotels and Resorts (MHR) was established as a global brand by Millennium & Copthorne Hotels plc to provide a common marketing and operating platform across its entire portfolio. Founded on the philosophy of genuine hospitality, this dynamic hospitality group has an outstanding reputation for excellence, taking pride in exceeding the needs of its business and leisure travelers. The strategic locality of its properties in gateway cities such as London , Paris , Dubai , Abu Dhabi , Doha , Singapore , Beijing , Shanghai , Seoul , Taipei , Hong Kong , Kuala Lumpur , and Bangkok makes MHR the perfect address to conduct your business or indulge yourself while on holiday. Established in the United States in 2000, the North American arm of MHR includes a portfolio 14 hotels in New York , Los Angeles , Chicago , Boston , Anchorage, Boulder, Buffalo , Cincinnati , Durham , Minneapolis , Nashville and Scottsdale. www.millenniumhotels.com Logo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150825/260869LOGO To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/fall-into-food-festivals-and-fun-this-season-with-millennium-hotels-and-resorts-north-america-300132899.html SOURCE Millennium Hotels and Resorts Copyright 2011 PR Newswire.
